name: One Time in Space
description:
A submission for the 2019 GMTK Gamejam.

Controls:

Mouse 1 - Push the robot

Mouse 1 hold - Use to open locked doors 

Crashed in space, in an unknown world. You are trying to find your spaceship. The only spaceship. And make your way home. 

You need to help your only friend, who happens to be a robot who have run out of power, back to the space ship by pushing him to it. 

Only one button is used in this platformer, your mouse 1. There is only one level, but it can be pretty hard to clear it. You have one friend, and only one goal, get away from this weird place and go home.
